data: The Grand Duchess had lately been brought to bed of a Prince, or rather she was just recovering from her accouchement; and there was an entertainment every day at the palace, where all persons of distinction of both sexes did not fail to resort.
The Life and Adventures of Guzman D'Alfarache, or the Spanish Rogue, vol. 3/3
Alemán, Mateo, 1547-1614?; Brady, John Henry [Translator]; Le Sage, Alain René, 1668-1747 [Translator]
